name: Mine Explorers
description:
This is Mine Explorers, a little 2D block game inspired by Minecraft to try to rebuild the game in 2D so I can add my own new features. All worlds here are pure random so trying to get the same world twice is very rare.

So far the game just has player movement and basic world generation.

But this version of the game: v0.1 is an alpha version of the game and dated November 14th 2021. I hope to keep updating this project.
